title: When did everyone reach honor 5 (or their highes achieved) in 2017

replies.body:
It's not just how well you did, but also how much you played.
I was (early-mid) Sept, but I cba looking up exact dates.

[edit] Also, people tend to honour less often in ARAM.
I hit mine October 29th but I wasn't playing all that much last year. One of my top 3 champs was Thresh and I think I only played him in the Dark Star game mode and a couple of ARAMs.
I never did hell i didnâ€™t even hit honor 3
